definition: Hillary (name)/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4

sentences.english: "The abductee issue is [one] of grave concern, " Clinton said.
sentences.chinese: “绑架问题值得严重关切，”希拉里说。

sentences.english: He faces an uphill battle against either Obama or Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 他将面对与奥巴马或者希拉里的升级选战。

sentences.english: Recent polls in Indiana give a slight edge to Clin ton.
sentences.chinese: 最近的民调结果给希拉里还来了微弱的优势。

sentences.english: Her selection is still to be formalized and will not be announced until after Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 在感恩节结束之前，希拉里不会正式宣布其决定。

sentences.english: Hillary was a good choice, she can tell a lie without even blinking.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里是一个不错的选择，丫简直说谎不带眨眼的。

sentences.english: Hillary Clinton's returns from Asia having made a first-class debut.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在亚洲展现了第一流的初次亮相。

sentences.english: Hillary’s mother, Dorothy, and Chelsea were going with me to India.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里的母亲桃乐西和切尔西陪我一起去了印度。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said he presided over a " narco- state."
sentences.chinese: 国务卿希拉里说卡尔扎伊管理的是一个“毒品国家”。
希拉里于本周五满60周岁。

sentences.english: He was though prepared to state that Hilario would be handed the goalkeeper's gloves for the Barcelona match.
sentences.chinese: 他认为准备让希拉里奥对阵巴塞罗那的比赛中首发。

sentences.english: And even the most Clinton-leaning prognosticators allowed for some chance of a Trump win.
sentences.chinese: 即使最挺希拉里的预测家都认可川普有些机会赢。

sentences.english: It also raises the question, What will Clinton's terms of surrender turn out to be?
sentences.chinese: 问题是，希拉里将为自己的退出作何解释？

sentences.english: “Mom didn't want Hilary to become a spoiled26 brat27,” says Haylie.
sentences.chinese: “妈妈不想把希拉里宠坏了，”海莉说。

sentences.english: Here is what transpired when Hillary sat down to talk with Herb.
sentences.chinese: 以下是希拉里坐下来跟赫伯谈话时发生的情形。

sentences.english: Yet it would be naive to expect Hillary-hatred to go away.
sentences.chinese: 但因此就期望对希拉里的反对烟消云散就太天真了。

sentences.english: And Clinton vowed that she will not be " shying away from talking about human rights issues."
sentences.chinese: 希拉里发誓说，她将不会避忌谈论有关人权问题。

definition: Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician

definition: Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect)/(Tw) surname Trump
Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
Monica Lewinsky (1973-), former White House intern
